# B8TeX Template Examples - Generated PDFs

This directory contains example PDFs generated by the b8tex template system.

## Example PDFs

### Basic Templates (Example 08)
- `document.pdf` - Minimal NeurIPS document
- `draft_paper.pdf` - Draft mode with line numbers
- `final_paper.pdf` - Final publication mode
- `confidential_report.pdf` - Confidential document mode
- `neurips_example.pdf` - NeurIPS template
- `iclr_example.pdf` - ICLR template
- `acl_example.pdf` - ACL template

### Advanced Features (Example 11)
- `conditional_with_theory.pdf` - Document with conditional theory section (included)
- `conditional_no_theory.pdf` - Document with conditional theory section (excluded)
- `paper_with_bibliography.pdf` - ACL paper with BibTeX bibliography
- `custom_commands_demo.pdf` - Mathematical document with custom LaTeX commands
- `template_neurips.pdf` - NeurIPS template showcase
- `template_iclr.pdf` - ICLR template showcase
- `template_acl.pdf` - ACL template showcase
- `builder_showcase.pdf` - DocumentBuilder API demonstration

## Features Demonstrated

### Templates
- ✓ NeurIPS conference format
- ✓ ICLR conference format
- ✓ ACL conference format

### Status Modes
- ✓ Draft (with line numbers and draft watermark)
- ✓ Final (publication ready)
- ✓ Confidential (with confidential marking)

### Advanced Features
- ✓ ConditionalSection with string variables
- ✓ Bibliography from InMemorySource
- ✓ Custom LaTeX commands (\R, \E, \loss, \grad)
- ✓ Custom LaTeX packages
- ✓ Template variables with Jinja2
- ✓ DocumentBuilder fluent API
- ✓ Nested sections and subsections

## File Sizes
Most documents are 8-21 KB, demonstrating efficient LaTeX compilation.

## Generated
These PDFs were generated automatically by running the examples in `examples/`.
All source code is available in the repository.
